name: Hero Rescue - Avengers edition
description:
The Marvel Avengers: Thor, Iron Man, Hulk, Captain, Hawkeye, Black Widow
You’ve known Iron Man? You’ve known Thor? You’ve known Hulk?
American Captain? Hawkeye? Black Widow?
They’re super heroes – The Avengers who save the world.
But when they’re in danger, who save super heroes?
Who save The Avengers?
Loki has owned a new dangerous machine. It can clone every one to many copies. Of course, he can clone and control a strongest army with hundred faked super heroes: Iron Man, Thor, Hulk, American Captain, Hawkeye, Black Widow. The real Avengers was catched and prisoned. They need your help!
You must let’s go now!
Your mission is finding fake super heroes and destroy them before rescue the real Avengers.
This puzzle game is very simple and similar with Candy Crush Saga or Bejewelled. Just match 3, 4 or 5 similar fake super heroes to destroy them instantly. There’re some power item what you can use in rescue progress: gloves, super bomb, extra moves…
Tips:
You’ll rescue Black Widow after 5 levels.
You’ll rescue Thor after 10 levels.
You’ll rescue Iron Man after 15 levels.
You’ll rescue Hulk after 25 levels.
You’ll rescue American Captain after 35 levels.
You’ll rescue Hawkeye after 45 levels.
